messages.message: Invalid sample channelType for colorModel in the basic DFD block.
messages.details: DFD block #1 sample #1 channelType in basic DFD block is (0x7) which is not valid for colorModel KHR_DF_MODEL_ETC1S.

messages.message: Non-conformant texture file accepted by libktx.
messages.details: KTX 2.0 file does not conform to the specification but it is currently accepted by libktx.
